name: Retail Outlet
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Happiness] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Various ARC branded products line its shelves, popular among the wealthy and brmming with retail profits.

name: Financial Intelligence Agency

civilopediaText.text: Ensuring ARC's financial stability, in various ways.

civilopediaText.text: A more massive version of the Robotics Assembly Plant, and almost entirely automated.
The cramped living conditions in ole Earth's PAC territories has resulted in a shared living space where colonists could relax - or create things, or grow things.

civilopediaText.text: A sprawling general market that takes up a district, businesses of all kinds are thriving here. Try out the street food!
